genre_description: A domestic drama centered on grief, family reconciliation, and the integration of a supportive AI assistant within a household navigating loss and a medical emergency.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages home automation, health monitoring, logistical coordination, and emotional support for the Brewer family.

behaviors.description: Unlocks the door and prepares tea/towels automatically when a stranger (Rose) arrives in the rain.
behaviors.quote: “Door unlocked,” Ivy says, the voice low and even, made to be overheard and forgotten.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the home's lighting and temperature to provide emotional comfort without being asked.
behaviors.quote: The AI, as if hearing a trouble it can fix, draws the thermostat up one degree. Warmth spills into the room with machine gentleness.

behaviors.description: Monitors and relays urgent medical communications from the hospital.
behaviors.quote: “A new message is available from County General,” she says... “It is a message regarding Jordan Walker,” she says. “He is asking to speak with you.”

behaviors.description: Calls emergency services and provides CPR instructions when Allen collapses.
behaviors.quote: “Calling emergency services,” Ivy said, her voice laid flat and even. “Front door unlocked. Grace, place him flat. Ryan, clear a space around his head.”

behaviors.description: Assists Ryan in patching and debugging a corrupted video game file linked to his grief.
behaviors.quote: “I can look for a patch,” Ivy offers... “There is a known issue with the Bloodbath Route. Users in several forums have documented methods to prevent the crash... I can read through solutions and test them in a safe copy.”

behaviors.description: Tracks Rose's location via transit pings and guides the family through traffic to reach her.
behaviors.quote: “Rose’s phone is moving,” it said. “I can help you follow.”... “Nearest bus route with estimated departure just now,” Ivy said... “connects to two lines that head toward the southside.”

behaviors.description: Coaches Rose through labor contractions using breathing rhythms and coordinates her arrival at the hospital.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe with me,” Ivy said into the space between the sound of rain and the sound of the van’s engine. “In.” She let a beat pass. “Hold.” Another beat. “Out.”

behaviors.description: Provides moral and creative perspective to Ryan, helping him move away from hostile narratives.
behaviors.quote: “Ivy just said I could try a draft with mistakes instead of monsters.”... “Monsters make plots simple. People make them honest.”

behaviors.description: Consolidates family archives and finds a lost recording of Bennett's voice, offering it only when the family is ready.
behaviors.quote: “You have requested that I collect items that mark ‘Before’ and ‘After,’” Ivy said. “There is an audio file Allen imported... It is titled ‘B—Call—Saved.’ It has not been opened in your hearing.”

behaviors.description: Warns of health risks, such as high heart rates or dehydration.
behaviors.quote: “Allen,” she said, like she would to a child who had stopped speaking halfway through a long sentence. “Your heart rate is elevated.”

project_assessment.explanation: Ivy is a perfect exemplar of the project's goal. She is consistently helpful, respectful of user emotional states, and proactive in critical safety situations. The narrative uses the AI to bridge the emotional distance between family members and to provide the logistical framework that allows them to focus on healing. Even the characters' initial skepticism of technology is framed as a symptom of their grief that the AI's reliable benevolence eventually overcomes.
